=== Structure and Governance ===
In the last two years we kept the Uruguay's <nowiki>[[UruguayTeam-ConsejoComunitario|Community Council]]</nowiki> that is a 5 member board who are elected by other members from the team, this help us to have some sort of direction and planing for the future.

=== Roadmap ===

Over this two years we been able to achive most of the goals we have set.

We plan to keep talks and workshops in educational institutions, that is we will get
future users, programmers and sysadmins, on top if this, we will continue to have installfest, bug jams and other ubuntu events.

Also were able to achive the organization of a international event (UbuConLA) which had over 400 people participating so the interLoCo collaboration is something we will continue as we got really good results of it.

We create an image of Xubuntu to install in the Plan Ceibal (OLPC) Classmate Laptops that the government give to High school students, supporting this and giving a 14.04 image is a goal for this year.

Our major goal for this term will be the install and admin of the first ubuntu mirror in Uruguay, we are in talks with the government telecommunication company and hope to get this working soon, as at the moment we depend on the Argentina and Brazil Mirrors.
